CustomField.description: This field calculates passed working days since case is open. If closed, it shows the difference between created date and closed date, otherwise it shows the difference between created date and the present day.
CustomField.formula: If( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c,'Closed'), (5 * ( FLOOR( ( datevalue( Date_Time_Closed__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( datevalue(Date_Time_Closed__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( datevalue(CreatedDate)- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ), (5 * ( FLOOR( ( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( today()- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( datevalue(CreatedDate)- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Working days elapsed since case is created.
CustomField.label: Duration
